ml.alternet.web

Class WebContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.web.WebContext

  • public final class WebContext
extends Object
    Hold the Web context for each thread.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a Web context.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The MIME type, e.g. "text/html".
